name: Abstract Visions
artistStatement: An exploration of abstract forms in the digital space.

artworks.title: Banded Sky
artworks.description: A visual exploration of layered skies over time.
artworks.altText: A banded sky with various shades of blue and orange layered on top of each other.
artworks.artsyAltText: The sky seems to unfold like pages in a book, each layer more vibrant than the last.

artworks.title: Randomization
artworks.description: An experiment in controlled chaos through audio-visuals.
artworks.altText: A random shifting of colors and shapes in a chaotic dance.
artworks.artsyAltText: Chaos organizes itself into an unexpected symphony of colors and motion.

artworks.title: Text Rain
artworks.description: The Full Text of Frankenstein by Mary Shelley rains down from the top of the screen.
artworks.altText: The Full Text of Frankenstein by Mary Shelley rains down from the top of the screen.
artworks.artsyAltText: An alternative way to envision the text of a book as words rain down from the top of the screen. Each word comes in an unexpected place.

artworks.title: Arranged Soundspace
artworks.description: 3D renders over a reflective plane. The shapes and size of the shapes is determined by audio inputs.
artworks.altText: A mess of sharp-angled geometries hovers slightly above a reflective surface.
artworks.artsyAltText: Pulsing and pounding with the changes in ambient noise, a sharp shape shifts and shimmers above a sleek surface. Skies from other worlds lie beyond.
